bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I buzz around flowers. What am I?
I am long and thin, and I crawl on the ground. I can be green, brown, or even colorful. What am I?
I have spots, and I'm red, orange, or yellow. People say I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have a lot of dots.

bug.question: I can hop very high and I am usually green. I make a chirping noise. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I can make music by rubbing my legs.

bug.question: I am small and black, and I live in a colony. I carry things that are much bigger than me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very strong for my size.
🏠 I live in a nest underground.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then spin a cocoon. After some time, I emerge with colorful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I drink nectar with a long straw.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my dinner, but I am not an insect. What am I?

hints.text: 🕷️ I can be very scary looking

bug.question: I look like a stick to hide from predators. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat leaves and blend in with my surroundings.
🌳 I am an expert at camouflage.

bug.question: I glow in the dark to attract a mate. What am I?
I am known for building my home underground and create mounds made of soil. What am I?

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears, and I love to eat peanuts. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.
🐘 I am a very large animal.

animal.question: I say 'meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I love to play with yarn.

animal.question: I hop around and lay eggs, and I'm a favorite at Easter. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 I have long ears and a fluffy tail.
🌱 I like to hop in the grass.

animal.question: I am known as the king of the jungle and I roar loudly. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a mane around my neck.
🦁 I am a big cat in Africa.

animal.question: I quack and swim, and I have ducklings. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I love to swim in ponds.

animal.question: I swing from trees and eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I like to play in trees.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have a unique pattern of black and white.

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can squirt ink when scared.
⚫ I have suckers on my arms.

animal.question: I slither on the ground and some of us are venomous. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I shed my skin as I grow.
🥚 Some people think I am scary, others find me beautiful.
☀️ I like to be in warm, sunny places.

animal.question: I am a nocturnal bird known for my 'hoot'. What am I?

hints.text: 🦉 I can turn my head almost all the way around.
🐭 I eat small animals like mice.
